attributes.action: An inquiry into the government’s poor handling of the COVID-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: This government needs to be held to account for its chronic failures to its people. Many people have lost friends and loved ones due to the failings of this government.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson and have government have failed the British people on every level In there hour of need. This government has been extremely slow to act over this crisis. Chronic shortages in PPE for frontline staff and a lack of testing for many weeks have led to thousands of unnecessary deaths.
